text: Harley Towler (born 11 December 1992) is a badminton player from England. He started playing badminton at age 7. In 2012 and 2013, he became Loughborough Sportsman of the Year. He was educated at the William Farr School and graduated from Loughborough University with a sport & exercise science degree. == Achievements == === BWF International Challenge/Series === Men's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
